weather.precipitation: Snowfall is common, with an average of 50cm per month.
weather.what_to_pack: Pack warm clothing, waterproof boots, gloves, and hats.

tourism.crowds: Fewer tourists compared to peak summer season.
tourism.costs: Accommodation and activities may be less expensive.
tourism.booking_advice: Book accommodations in advance, especially during holidays.

highlights.name: Christmas Market at Old Town
highlights.description: Magical market with festive decorations and local crafts.
highlights.tips: Try traditional Glühwein (mulled wine) and Tyrolean specialties.

highlights.name: Skiing at Nordkette
highlights.description: Skiing and snowboarding with stunning views of the city.
highlights.tips: Check for avalanche risk levels and weather conditions before skiing.

highlights.name: Swarovski Crystal Worlds
highlights.description: Explore art installations and unique crystal exhibits.
highlights.tips: Visit during weekdays for fewer crowds.

highlights.name: Winter Hiking at Patscherkofel
highlights.description: Scenic trails for all levels of hikers amidst snowy landscapes.
highlights.tips: Wear proper hiking boots and carry water and snacks.

highlights.name: Ice Skating at Olympiaworld
highlights.description: Enjoy ice skating in the heart of Innsbruck.
highlights.tips: Rent skates on-site if you don't have your own.

highlights.name: Innsbruck Alpine Zoo
highlights.description: See Alpine animals in their winter habitats.
highlights.tips: Check feeding times for animal interactions.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Experience the winter wonderland of Innsbruck.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Book in advance for preferred time slots.
Rent snowshoes if you don't have your own.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Experience the festive atmosphere of Innsbruck.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Try different markets for unique offerings.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Explore the historic castle in a peaceful winter setting.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Check opening hours and guided tour availability.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Get a bird's eye view of the snow-covered landscapes.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Book a reputable company for safety.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Witness ski jump competitions and enjoy panoramic views.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Check the schedule for events and opening hours.

not_recommended: Outdoor swimming or water-based activities due to cold temperatures.
